quote: When one teaches, two learn.
name: Robert Half

quote: The pine stays green in winter... wisdom in hardship.
name: Norman Douglas

quote: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
name: Sai Baba

quote: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort.
name: John Ruskin

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Talent is a flame. Genius is a fire.
name: Bernard Williams

quote: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
name: Confucius

quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: Everything that we see is a shadow cast by that which we do not see.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
name: Unknown

quote: We cannot teach people anything; we can only help them discover it within themselves.
name: Galileo Galilei

quote: There are things known and there are things unknown, and in between are the doors of perception.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: You cannot push any one up a ladder unless he be willing to climb a little himself.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: We are what we believe we are.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
name: Anne Frank

quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
name: Marie Curie

quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
name: Voltaire

quote: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you'll meet them on your way down.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: Your goals, minus your doubts, equal your reality.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is opinion.
name: Democritus

quote: The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: What worries you, masters you.
name: John Locke

quote: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I think; therefore I am.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: Challenging the meaning of life is the truest expression of the state of being human.
name: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Never mistake motion for action.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
name: Aristotle

quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: John Locke

quote: Well begun is half done.
name: Aristotle

quote: Rough diamonds may sometimes be mistaken for worthless pebbles.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
name: Robert W. Service

quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: James Joyce

quote: I hear, I know. I see, I remember. I do, I understand.
name: Confucius

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
name: John Wooden

quote: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
name: Babe Ruth

quote: The very essence of instinct is that it's followed independently of reason.
name: Charles Darwin

quote: If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: United we stand, divided we fall.
name: Aesop

quote: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
name: Helen Keller

quote: There is nothing more uncommon than common sense.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: None so deaf as those that will not hear. None so blind as those that will not see.
name: Matthew Henry

quote: A fine quotation is a diamond in the hand of a man of wit and a pebble in the hand of a fool.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: True greatness consists in being great in little things.
name: Charles Simmons

quote: People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: I believe things cannot make themselves impossible.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep.
name: Saul Bellow

quote: To be is to do.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: After all is said and done, more is said than done.
name: Aesop

quote: We are all gifted. That is our inheritance.
name: Ethel Waters

quote: Idealism increases in direct proportion to one's distance from the problem.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: People are not disturbed by things, but by the view they take of them.
name: Epictetus

quote: You're either part of the solution or you're part of the problem.
name: Eldridge Cleaver

quote: In the end, people are persuaded not by what we say, but by what they understand.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Fortune favors the prepared mind.
name: Louis Pasteur

quote: We are not permitted to choose the frame of our destiny. But what we put into it is ours.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: If youth knew; if age could.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: If not me, who? And if not now, when?
name: Mikhail Gorbachev

quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise. Seek what they sought.
name: Matsuo Basho

quote: If I am what I have and if I lose what I have who then am I?
name: Erich Fromm

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: He who defends everything defends nothing.
name: Frederick the Great

quote: Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor, or our life with one hope.
name: Epictetus

quote: God gives the nuts, but he does not crack them.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: There are three classes of people: those who see, those who see when they are shown, those who do not see.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: There are three musts that hold us back: I must do well. You must treat me well. And the world must be easy.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread.
name: Richard Wright

quote: We do not judge the people we love.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: There is no greater impediment to the advancement of knowledge than the ambiguity of words.
name: Thomas Reid

quote: Our self image, strongly held, essentially determines what we become.
name: Maxwell Maltz

quote: You exist only in what you do.
name: Federico Fellini

quote: All wish to possess knowledge, but few, comparatively speaking, are willing to pay the price.
name: Juvenal

quote: Important principles may, and must, be inflexible.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We must be our own before we can be another's.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too.
name: Voltaire

quote: The winds and the waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: The universe is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
name: Eden Phillpotts

quote: Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will.
name: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Really, the only thing that makes sense is to strive for greater collective enlightenment.
name: Elon Musk

quote: A man doesn't know what he knows until he knows what he doesn't know.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: It is only in our decisions that we are important.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We forfeit three-quarters of ourselves in order to be like other people.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: We all have ability. The difference is how we use it.
name: Charlotte Whitton

quote: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands.
name: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: We can learn something new anytime we believe we can.
name: Virginia Satir

quote: The whole point of getting things done is knowing what to leave undone.
name: Oswald Chambers

quote: At times I think and at times I am.
name: Paul Valery

quote: It's the people who try to be clever who never are; the people who are clever never think of trying to be.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: Every man must decide for himself whether he shall master his world or be mastered by it.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: You cannot step into the same river twice.
name: Heraclitus

quote: A brainy person does not abuse copyright; instead they respect it and uphold it.
name: Maximillian Degenerez

quote: A certain amount of opposition is a great help to a man. Kites rise against, not with, the wind.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: The precision of naming takes away from the uniqueness of seeing.
name: Pierre Bonnard

quote: I'm not a genius. I'm just a tremendous bundle of experience.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Character is what a man is in the dark.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Nothing endures but personal qualities.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: We may pass violets looking for roses. We may pass contentment looking for victory.
name: Bernard Williams

quote: A pure hand needs no glove to cover it.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: I shut my eyes in order to see.
name: Paul Gauguin

quote: We can believe what we choose. We are answerable for what we choose to believe.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: The possible ranks higher than the actual.
name: Martin Heidegger

quote: It is only in the world of objects that we have time and space and selves.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Thinking is more interesting than knowing, but less interesting than looking.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Tell me to what you pay attention and I will tell you who you are.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: One can resist the invasion of an army but one cannot resist the invasion of ideas.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order.
name: M. C. Escher

quote: What do you hang on the walls of your mind?
name: Eve Arnold

quote: Fortune favors the audacious.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Lend yourself to others, but give yourself to yourself.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Good order is the foundation of all things.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: We have all the light we need, we just need to put it in practice.
name: Albert Pike

quote: The destiny of man is in his own soul.
name: Herodotus

quote: I do not seek. I find.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: There are no new ideas. There are only new ways of making them felt.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Everything that is beautiful and noble is the product of reason and calculation.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Truth has no special time of its own. Its hour is now - always.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: It is one thing to praise discipline, and another to submit to it.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Talent works, genius creates.
name: Robert Schumann

quote: Talent does what it can; genius does what it must.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Even truth needs to be clad in new garments if it is to appeal to a new age.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: What we do belongs to what we are; and what we are is what becomes of us.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Man is born to live and not to prepare to live.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: It is easy to get everything you want, provided you first learn to do without the things you cannot get.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: One can be the master of what one does, but never of what one feels.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Wit is the salt of conversation, not the food.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Be intent upon the perfection of the present day.
name: William Law

quote: One of the greatest joys known to man is to take a flight into ignorance in search of knowledge.
name: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: A man must not deny his manifest abilities, for that is to evade his obligations.
name: William Feather

quote: The envious man grows lean at the success of his neighbor.
name: Horace

quote: If in doubt, don't. If still in doubt, do what's right.
name: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: The mind cannot foresee its own advance.
name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: We see things as we are, not as they are.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Nothing is so good as it seems beforehand.
name: George Eliot

quote: The more refined and subtle our minds, the more vulnerable they are.
name: Paul Tournier

quote: You create your own reality.
name: Jane Roberts

quote: Ill habits gather unseen degrees, as brooks make rivers, rivers run to seas.
name: John Dryden

quote: Not only strike while the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
name: Oliver Cromwell

quote: If kids and teenagers can get into a band, it's probably not because they think it's brainy.
name: Ezra Koenig

quote: I wish it, I command it. Let my will take the place of a reason.
name: Juvenal

quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: Be sure your wisest words are those you do not say.
name: Robert W. Service

quote: All serious daring starts from within.
name: Eudora Welty

quote: Genius is rarely able to give any account of its own processes.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: To be is to be the value of a variable.
name: Willard Van Orman Quine

quote: The joy of the mind is the measure of its strength.
name: Ninon de L'Enclos

quote: The farther reason looks the greater is the haze in which it loses itself.
name: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: You can't be taught to be brainy. You've either got it or you don't.
name: Samantha Fox

quote: There are no elements so diverse that they cannot be joined in the heart of a man.
name: Jean Giraudoux

quote: Memory is more indelible than ink.
name: Anita Loos

quote: Unless we remember we cannot understand.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Genius is never understood in its own time.
name: Bill Watterson

quote: Every moment is a golden one for him who has the vision to recognize it as such.
name: Henry Miller

quote: It is easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them.
name: Alfred Adler

quote: Our nature is the mind. And the mind is our nature.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: Inspiration arrives as a packet of material to be delivered.
name: John Updike

quote: Sometimes you can know too much. A lot of brainy people like Stephen Fry are quite depressive.
name: Karl Pilkington

quote: Our first intuitions are the true ones.
name: Emil Cioran

quote: Ideals are the world's masters.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Write to be understood, speak to be heard, read to grow.
name: Lawrence Clark Powell

quote: An artist is he for whom the goal and center of life is to form his mind.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Life is but thought.
name: Sara Teasdale

quote: The return we reap from generous actions is not always evident.
name: Francesco Guicciardini

quote: Talent is a faculty that is highly developed, but genius commands all the faculties.
name: Francis Herbert Hedge

quote: Brainy's the new sexy.
name: Steven Moffat
